mapper.select: SELECT ri.ricode AS ricode, ri.rcode, ri.icode, ri.amount, i.name FROM recipe_ingredient ri JOIN ingredient i ON ri.icode = i.icode WHERE ri.rcode = #{rcode}
SELECT rocode, rcode, orderContent, orderNum, cookingImg FROM recipe_order WHERE rcode = #{rcode} ORDER BY orderNum
SELECT r.* FROM recipe r JOIN menu m ON r.mcode = m.mcode WHERE m.menuName = #{menuName}
SELECT r.*, m.menuName FROM recipe r JOIN menu m ON r.mcode = m.mcode ORDER BY r.rcode
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM recipe WHERE category IS NOT NULL AND category != '' ORDER BY category
SELECT DISTINCT theme FROM recipe WHERE theme IS NOT NULL AND theme != ''
SELECT * FROM recipe WHERE recipeName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{term}, '%') OR introduce LIKE CONCAT('%', #{term}, '%') OR category LIKE CONCAT('%', #{term}, '%')
select r.rcode, rt.tagContent from recipe r join recipe_tag rt on r.rcode = rt.rcode where r.rcode = #{rcode}
update recipe set view = view + 1 where rcode = #{rcode}
select r.rcode, count(rr.rrcode) recommendCnt from recipe r join recipe_recommend rr on r.rcode = rr.rcode where r.rcode = #{rcode} group by r.rcode
SELECT r.rcode, (SELECT ro.cookingImg FROM recipe_order ro WHERE ro.rcode = r.rcode ORDER BY ro.rocode DESC LIMIT 1) as lastCookingImg FROM recipe r where rcode = #{rcode}
SELECT RIGHT(url, 11) url FROM recipe order by rand() limit 5
